attributes.action: Give all NHS staff a 15% pay rise.
attributes.additional_details: Over the past decade NHS workers have seen their pay reduce relative to inflation, and we are now asking for this to be adjusted in the right direction. It is all well and good to clap for carers but claps don't pay the bills. We need more support and we are asking for your help.
attributes.background: Nurses shouldn't have to attend food banks to feed themselves and their families. We are asking for a 15% pay rise for all NHS staff in a year like no other.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
